    Methods in taskmanagement.application.viewmodel that return Property
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Property<Boolean>
    TasksViewModel.canRedoProperty()
    Property that emits true when redo is available.
    Property<Boolean>
    TasksViewModel.canUndoProperty()
    Property that emits true when undo is available.
    Property<List<TasksViewModel.RowDTO>>
    TasksViewModel.filteredRowsProperty()
    Property that emits filtered rows whenever data or filter changes.
    Property<List<TasksViewModel.RowDTO>>
    TasksViewModel.rowsProperty()
    Property that emits unfiltered rows whenever data changes.

    Methods in taskmanagement.ui.api that return Property
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Property<Boolean>
    TasksViewAPI.canRedoProperty()
    Returns an observable flag indicating whether a redo operation is possible.
    Property<Boolean>
    TasksViewAPI.canUndoProperty()
    Returns an observable flag indicating whether an undo operation is possible.
    Property<List<ITask>>
    TasksViewAPI.filteredTasksProperty()
    Returns an observable property of tasks after applying the current filter.
    Property<List<ITask>>
    TasksViewAPI.tasksProperty()
    Returns an observable property of all tasks (unfiltered), suitable for UI binding.
